items.sentence: Tom and I ate dinner without saying a word to each other.
Tom always used to kiss me goodbye when he left for work.
Tom and I are planning to get married on Valentine's Day.
Tom didn't realize that Mary was waiting for him outside.
Tom wasn't the only one who was busy. Mary was busy, too.
It seems that things have really worked out well for you.
I suspect Tom and Mary will have to do that on their own.
Scream and cry as much as you want. Nobody will hear you.
Scream and cry as much as you want. No one will hear you.
Tom promised himself he'd study harder for the next test.
